titleStmt.title: To the right honourable the knights, citizens, and burgesses in Parliament assembled The humble petition of thousands of the vvell affected inhabitants of the cities of London and Westminster, and the suburbes thereof, with the borough of Southwarke, and places adjacent, in behalfe of themselves and other well-affected persons in the kingdome of England.

notesStmt.note: Praying that troops may be raised for the support of the rebels in Ireland.
At end of document: This is licensed and entered into the Hall Booke according to order: Henry Walley.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
